description: Initial release of the game. Prototype scene and basic player controls.
Fix model bug with a slope in the prototype scene.
Finalize level design for chapter 1-1 through chapter 1-3. Also adds lighting and decorations around the levels. Gameplay for chapter 1-1 to chapter 1-3 is complete. See full patch notes.
New Weapon system, new AI system, new main menu, and many, many bugfixes
Switch Project to URP and add mobile builds
Major update that will overhaul Chapter 1 and add many gameplay aspects to the chapter
